job.title: Software Developer / Software Engineer / Web API Developer
job.description: ltpgtAt SchoolPass were changing the way schools think about campus movement and wellness Parents love using SchoolPass to communicate wellness attendance and dismissal changes to everyone at the school with the tap of a button and schools love using SchoolPass to streamline their dismissal process and make sure every kid goes where theyre supposed to at the end of the dayltpgtltpgtWere headquartered in the Greater DC Area and we have customers in 36 states from California to New York Our work is dynamic responsive and stimulatingltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a remote fulltime Software Engineer with web API backend experience to join our API and Integrations team We build and maintain web APIs and build integrations between our APIs and Third Party APIsltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat you will doltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork in a small fullyremote multifunctional team that maintains the systems at the core of our businessltligtltligtUnderstand the full technology stack and how all the pieces fit togetherltligtltligtDeliver testable maintainable and highquality codeltligtltligtShare knowledge promote best practices and collaborate with other engineersltligtltligtDevelop and deploy web APIs and integrations with web APIsltligtltligtTake operational responsibility for the services we deployltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtWhat we are looking forltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtYou have 3 years of Object Oriented programming languages and best practices with experience in or a desire to learn CltligtltligtYou have experience building web APIs built on top of MVC FrameworksltligtltligtYou are familiar with SQL based databasesltligtltligtYou are comfortable running your software in Windows environmentsltligtltligtYou are interested in
